It\'s a hearty, nutritious meal that\'s a staple in Bihar.',origin:'Bihar',bestPlaces:'Street vendors, local restaurants near the temple'},{name:'Thukpa',description:'A Tibetan noodle soup with vegetables, meat (optional), and aromatic spices. These flaky, layered pastries are crispy on the outside and sweet inside. A popular offering at temples and a favorite among pilgrims.',origin:'India',bestPlaces:'Sweet shops, temple vendors'},{name:'Kulhad Chai',description:'Traditional Indian tea served in small clay cups (kulhad).
